name: Winchester Mansion
description:
Winchester Mansion is a 2D roguelike shooter, mysteriously built on a topdown camera where the player becomes one of the most curious members of the G.A (Ghostbusters Association), using special energies to try to discover the final rooms Winchester Mansion has.

Controls

Atack: Left Mouse Button

Dash: Right Mouse Button

Blue Proton: 1

Yellow Proton: 2

Red Proton: 3

PS: After killing all the ghosts, enter the doors.
